website_summaries.verdict: This 13-piece cookware set is made from a durable anodized aluminum that is rust- and scrape-resistant.
pros: Complete kit for 2 that includes 13 pieces in all
Set includes a pot, frying pan, bowls, folding silicone cups, and a variety of utensils, all of which fits in an Oxford drawstring bag
Pots are made from nonstick anodized aluminum that resists scraping and corrosion
cons: Some found a lot of the pieces here to be either too short or too small
Some reports that the nonstick surfaces didn't work well

website_summaries.verdict: This compact mess kit includes everything you need to cook, dine and clean up in comfort in the great outdoors.
pros: 13-piece kit that contains a pot and pan with lid
Wash cloth for cleaning up after meals
cons: Though the pot and pan are supposed to be nonstick, some users say this is not true

customer_reviews.title: Great mess kit for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great mess kit for the money. I have used the pot and pan and utensils to prepare every meal on several camping trips. The pot and pan work great and its nice how the whole kit can be condensed down into a very small and portable package. The product is easy to clean as long as you dont let the food sit, rinse it while its hot or food sticks a lot. The extra things it comes with is nice as is the carrying case. I would recommend this to anyone looking for an inexpensive all in one mess kit for one or two people.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tanner Photo

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad mess kit for beginner backpacker
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad mess kit for beginner backpacker. Lightweight, small and really is non-stick. I didn't use the cups, though they fold down flat to save space and seem ok. The handles really keep cool when my jet stove is turned up high. For the long haul though, I don't think this kit will last years or anything, maybe a few seasons. Good purchase for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Sean of the Dead

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Cookware Set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little cookware set. It has lots of useful accessories. I did a cook test on my old Coleman stove. I toasted a couple of buttered Bagels, which turned out great, then I fried a couple of eggs afterwards. The eggs turned out great also. I did use low heat, but nothing burned and there was very little sticking of the eggs to the skillet. What did stick came off very easily. One more thing, with this cookware set, you can remove the lid from the skillet or pot without burning your fingers. A plus in my book! I'm very satisfied with this cookware set and I would recommend it to a friend. Happy Camping! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: smaller than you would think
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an last minute add on to some camping gear I was buying for my daughter and son in-law. It looked like a set I had when I camped a lot and I remember liking them for packing. However the pans are too small to really be useful. Too bad. Check the dimensions - maybe they'd be good for backpacking? But for car camping I'd get a more useable set with larger pots.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, this mess kit is very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mess kit! Great price. Everything you need while on the trail or camping. Construction of the kit is very well made and planning many years of use. Good for two people. Light weight and fits great in my backpack hood(brain). Highly recommended. Also, customer service is great, very quick to respond. Thanks for the help Mark! Will be purchasing for this company again.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: So far haven't gotten the non stick to work
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for my solar cooker. Tried it out today. Heated up nicely but everything stuck to the pan. It was possible to clean it afterward. Maybe it needed to be preheated first. Will have to experiment a bit to see what works. That said, it did successfully cook my meal on my new solar cooker. Need a bit of practise on both for a better experience. I did give 4 stars because it seems to be a good value even with the sticking issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 11 Months of Extreme S.American Backpack Adventure
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago, right before I took off to Colombia, Peru, and Ecuador on an extensive diving/hitchiking/bikepacking/trekking adventure. This $30 pot/pan set never failed, and performed great the entire time. I took out most of the plastic shit it comes with and replaced it with aluminum cups/bowls. The whole setup was lightweight enough for me (minimal backpacking), and it retained and distributed heat easily (MSR Pocket Rocket Stove) I'm looking for great cooksets again, this time WITH the money to purchase a more high-end one, and I'm bummed this is no longer in stock, otherwise I'd go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Trunnell

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for backpacking. Very light weight, durable and large size for attaching to your backpack. I would not recommend this for camping if your looking for something large enough to feed 4+ people, but if your wanting to backpack in and need something light weight to carry this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Pots
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set to have for either one person on an extended trip or 2 people for a quick day trip. The amount of utensils and pots available meet every need imaginable. My wife and I took an over night trip, I cooked bacon and eggs and had no issues. the most valuable tool in this kit is the wooden spatula. I used this every time I cooked with the set. The only reason I didn't list a full 5 stars is because these are very hard to clean. It takes quite a bit of time and would have been much better if they had non stick coating. Other than that great to have in your backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be very nice, exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a Really nice, quality set. I purchased this as a gift so I haven't actually used it. It is small, for one or two people at most. But I loved how compact this is! As an avid camper, I'm always happy about saving space and reducing the amount of equipment I lug along.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: maybe for someone it is good but not for me the plastic feels like it ...
customer_reviews.text: maybe for someone it is good but not for me the plastic feels like it will break at least with the ladle and it is pretty heavy for what you are getting and a little to big for my bag and even thought i was not 100% satisfied i had to pay return shipping which i understand they dont want to lose money for me to try it but just didnt suit my needs
customer_reviews.author: unclejjp

customer_reviews.title: Well made, just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a well made product. Had an issue with the first one (the lid didn't fit perfectly), the company was GREAT to get me a new one out right away. The lid on the new one doesn't fit perfectly, but that is not a deal breaker for me. . More pieces than I need, but am confident it will perform. Strongly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must-have for all backpackers and survival kits. Its a full mess kit and it fits compactly in your bag. It cleans easy, just pour water in it and boil it for a few minutes to loosen up stuck on food, then just scrub it off with the rag provided and its good to go for next time! I will be recommending this to anyone I go backpacking with.
customer_reviews.author: Austin K

customer_reviews.title: A nice kit to have for explorer's, preppers, and TEOTWAWKI
customer_reviews.text: Great for use with the Zeyu Compact Wood Burning Backpacking Stove! We bought this just for this purpose. To have something to take camping that is portable and easy to use, and self contained.
customer_reviews.author: John and Kristy Black

customer_reviews.title: Good except...
customer_reviews.text: The lid sits very loose on both the pot and pan, causing it to rattle in the bag. If they made slight adjustments to the fitment and replaced the wooden toy spatula with a thermoplastic one, this would be an OK mess kit at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Bellyslap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product came quick and just as described. Son needed for camping trip and had to actually leave some stuff home as there are duplicates of a couple of items.
customer_reviews.author: TUCO

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: these have great quality. Are lightweight and easy to clean. handles don't melt. Great to use with sterno stove for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Suni Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a little package!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would have liked is if they sold a mess kit for 4! Other than that this really did the job for me out primitive camping recently.
customer_reviews.author: Daohaus

customer_reviews.title: happy fiance
customer_reviews.text: my fiance had me order this for his upcoming trip to the boundary waters. he is very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight mess kit & full of what you need
customer_reviews.text: This mess kit is awesome! The pans can be used over a camp stove or directly over a camp fire - other pans aren't rated for camp fires, but this one is. I bought this to take with my grandkids to go backpacking & camping and we really like it. It has everything we needed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kynthano

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I imagined but functioned just fine over open fire!
customer_reviews.author: Jaii

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Husband was very excited about this gift and loved the little extras that came with it!
customer_reviews.author: monkeyneedfood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Love the silicone handles. Just what I need for camping and as an addition to my hurricane preparedness kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan31

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: Best one!!! Everything is tight, works as exactly as described. Top quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! Heats up fast. Very compact and made delicious food.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping or backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: They were lightweight, easy to clean, easy to use, great for backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was missing pieces. Food sticks. Had to replace some old gear lost in a flood and was looking for compact options. Will look for something else
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Caine

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Neat product, can’t wait to set up my pocket stove and try it out. The price is nice and I love the extra cups and spoons
customer_reviews.author: Scalp lock taker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mess kit
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use this mess kit yet but it's very complete and just what I need, appears very well made and compact
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Camp cooking made easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very lightweight and sturdy. Comes with everything you need to cook. Also love the storage bag. It can clip on the outside of your pack so it's easily accessible and doesn't take up space in your pack.
customer_reviews.author: carey dahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Camping Win
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set for camping! Worked great and is very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Ciancio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Alaska
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and very good quality, will be perfect for extended back pack trips in Alaska! Great packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just get it! Best one on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I got this one after ordering one similar from amazon. This one was way better. The silicone handles make it so it won’t melt like those cheap plastic handles from REDCAMP.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Sato

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Ive used it so many times! It hold well up to flames and cooks really evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Got a set for everyone in our ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Got a set for everyone in our family. Only downside is that they are a bit big/bulky for a kid backcountry camping. I love them, though, so I made room in the kids' bags anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Colombo Flatfoot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our backpacking
customer_reviews.text: Even more lightweight than I expected! Perfect for our backpacking trip
customer_reviews.author: F16BlueAngel

customer_reviews.title: I rly only bought this for the big pot, ...
customer_reviews.text: I rly only bought this for the big pot, used it about a dozen times and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Eko

customer_reviews.title: Great for Boy Scouts
customer_reviews.text: My son used this on his last boy scouts backpacking trip. He said it it worked great. Light weight and packs well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get good quility
customer_reviews.text: Good price for what you get.. average quility, too large for backpacking. But great for base camp.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product well made, and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All in one convenient
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for camping and wanted something small and all in one convenient. This is just the right size that has it all in a small convent package.
customer_reviews.author: loraine schachle

customer_reviews.title: Too small to function
customer_reviews.text: Two small to be usable. I decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Cookin in the woods
customer_reviews.text: Hike didn't need it so I won't get a chance to use it till hunting season. Nice kit, well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R Roberge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated version of a mess kit and fits our camping needs well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great mess kit
customer_reviews.text: Great mess kit!! Love all the stuff it comes with!! The little cups are great for measuring when cooking! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashly

customer_reviews.title: He thinks it is great and fits with his emergency
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my brother. He thinks it is great and fits with his emergency kit
customer_reviews.author: C K

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this item for a future hiking trip. Looks t be good quality for the price. Very happy with the weight of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Reese

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Super compact, everything is easily contained and holds well together. Can't wait to take this into future camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bowls are very small and cheaply made, but the silicone handles on the pans are a good idea. I doubt that the folding cups will last long, they are a soft 'mushy' material. One of the sporks arrived missing a handle. I think the kit is overpriced for the quality of the materials. I need something right away, so I would prefer not to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Menlo

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, well made and light! By far the best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the $
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality although I just got it today and haven’t tested it in the field. Reminds me of my Jetboil pit where it might easily burn food in the bottom. The “bowls” are pretty small, definitely not a whole serving and are made of a seemingly cheep plastic as well as the ladle. Sporks seem sturdy as do the pot, pan and lid.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Knauer

customer_reviews.title: Cookware set is great. I've taken this set out camping a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Cookware set is great. I've taken this set out camping a couple of times now and it has been easy to use. It is compact and light weight. Only problem I had was the wood spoon not drying enough and started to grow mold between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the quality if by far better than the last one I had
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but so far, the quality if by far better than the last one I had. Plus the pot lid also fits the frying pan!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C.

customer_reviews.title: Not very non stick
customer_reviews.text: After making ramen and sausage with peppers in each pan, theye gotten stuck with burn food. Not as non stick as any non stick pans I've used
customer_reviews.author: Marino Bambino

customer_reviews.title: Not non-stick..
customer_reviews.text: This is not non-stick cookware! You can probably add oil to the pan before cooking but that defeats the purpose of non-stick! I'm so glad I tested it out before I left for my trip. My other complaint is though the pans are stackable there is nothing to hold them together other than the bag.. Better hope it never rips..
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Not this product pilgrim..........
customer_reviews.text: It just does not have that well made feeling.... plus I am staying away from anything made of aluminum that deals with food..... do a google search on aluminum and Alzheimers. It scared me!
customer_reviews.author: Gorgehiker

customer_reviews.title: Childs play
customer_reviews.text: Cheap kids toy. Definitely not made for REAL backpacking wilderness excursions. Would not trust my life on meals from it.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of 6 Boys

product_meta.title: Mess Kit Non Melting Silicone Handles New Generation Anodized Non Stick Aluminum Pots-13 Piece Cookware Set - Oxford Drawstring Carrying Bag - Camping Cookware Survival - Handles That Stay in Position
feature_bullets: HIGHEST QUALITY MESS KIT: This camping cookware set is made of durable, non-toxic anodized aluminum. It's 100% Resistant to Scraping & Corrosion! Enjoy exploring the outdoors, hiking, camping, picnicking, scouting trips or keeping in your survival gear. This lightweight, compact and extremely useful mess kit, which will help you cook and secure nutrition in the wilderness! No more issues with stuff sticking. Say goodbye to permanently stained pans and hours of scratching off burnt on food.

COMPLETE OUTDOOR COOKWARE SET: Great for cooking for 2 people, this 13 piece kit contains 1 Pot, 1 Frying Pan, 1 Lid, 1 Ladle, 1 Wooden Spoon, 1 wash cloth, 2 Bowls, 2 Sporks & 2 Folding Silicone Cups - an amazing Value For Money! Our mess kit nests compactly together and also comes with an Oxford drawstring carry bag, allowing you to store it in your backpack, tie it on your bike or pack it up along with the rest of your camping gear, with ease!

COOKING SAFETY: We have perfected our kit's design. Our pots and pans feature Scald-Proof, foldable handles and cover hooks, made from BPA-Free, Food-Grade silicone - protecting your hands, fingers and palms from burns while handling your hot cookware! Gone are the old models with loose handles that won't stay in place and replaced with a secure stainless steel catch so your handles meet evenly every time. Cook confidently over high heats without the worry of warping pots and pans.

EASY TO CARRY, SPACE-SAVING SET: STOP using countless plastic or rubber utensils that will wear you down while carrying them! Our mess kit eliminates the bulk associated with run-of-the-mill cookware! It makes for a foolproof choice for cooking outdoors, as it contains EVERYTHING you might need to either boil, fry, or grill your favorite meals, with minimal resources, on the go!

100% RISK FREE GUARANTEE: We take great pride in the quality of our mess kit, which is why we are offering you a Risk-Free purchase. In the unlikely event our product fails to meet or exceed your expectations, you can return your mess kit for a FULL refund of your purchase even if you it has had its first trip to the GREAT OUTDOORS. Get Now The Best Camping Mess Kit On Amazon!
